rcsvers.vim

30 Nov 2006 It looks like some other people had the same as me, using RCS and vim together...

There is a vim script here which you have to place in ~/.vim/plugin

Also add this in ~/.vimrc

"re-map rcsvers.vim keys 
map  \rlog 
map  \older 
map  \newer
